page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: There is one{County Primary school}in the centre of the village.At the present moment there are 25 pupils ranging in age from 4-11 .There are 2 full time teachers,a part time cook, caretaker and secretary.Those children who live more than 2 miles away, come to school by taxi. The school has a small playground that is transversed by a public footpath.Downstairs there are the cloakrooms and a classroom.Upstairs is the kitchen and the Infant Classroom which is also the dining room and P.E.hall. At the age of 11 the children transfer to{Lady Lumleys (Comprehensive)}in Pickering.A school coach picks them up as there is no public transport. The school building was built in 1874 as a Lecture Hall and used as a school since 1875.
